</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the library disclaimers. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''libraryDisclaimers''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [array1] - ''only has one element at the moment, but this number might grow''
</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] '''libraryDisclaimers''';   // as in Arma2 OA 1.62.95208</code>
